Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 48th overall pick, by Detroit in 2006...
Traded from Detroit to Colorado on 2/12/2008 (Going to DET: 1B L. Berkman, C G. Kottaras. Going to COL: 1B J. Morneau, P M. Minor, P A. Russell, LF T. Snider)...
Injured on 6/9/2008 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Traded from Colorado to Philadelphia on 3/2/2009 (Going to PHI: P C. Castillo, P R. Ortiz, P A. Russell, LF T. Snider, P J. Romero. Going to COL: P C. Sabathia)...
Injured on 4/24/2009 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Philadelphia to Kansas City on 7/31/2010 (Going to KCA: RF T. Snider, C J. Kendall. Going to PHI: SS J. Booty, C H. Cota)...
Traded from Kansas City to Los Angeles (A) on 7/31/2010 (Going to KCA: P E. Gagne, P C. Park. Going to LAA: RF T. Snider, P A. Pacheco)...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Philadelphia on 3/2/2012 (Going to LAA: LF C. Crisp. Going to PHI: LF A. Soriano, CF S. Victorino, DH T. Snider)...
Traded from Philadelphia to New York (A) on 1/31/2013 (Going to PHI: P J. Julio. Going to NYA: C G. Kottaras, RF T. Snider, P K. Olsen, P B. Lawrence)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 9/4/2016, off Aaron Crow (TEX)...
Won World Championship with New York (A) in 2016...
Injured on 5/5/2018 with a Bruised Hand, out for 3 days...
Traded from New York (A) to Milwaukee on 7/7/2018 (Going to MIL: DH T. Snider, P J. Taillon, P C. Tillman. Going to NYA: 2B W. Rollins, CF L. Martin)...
